nodes.name: NodeMultiInputToMultiOutputPySpark
nodes.description: This node runs any given PySpark code. The input dataframes is passed in the variable inDFs. The output array of dataframe is passed back by registering each dataframe as a temporary table.

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: code
fields.value:
'''
Input:
  spark: spark session 
  workflowContext:  workflowcontext object 
  id: node number 
  inDFs: array of input pyspark dataframes 
  cust_dict: Dictionary of the workflow variables passed from previous node 
Output:
  outDF: return pyspark dataframe i.e outDF 
 ''' 
 
from pyspark.sql.types import * 
from pyspark.sql.functions import * 
from pyspark.sql import * 
from fire.workflowcontext import WorkflowContext 

def myfn(spark: SparkSession, workflowContext: WorkflowContext, id: int, inDFs: [DataFrame], cust_dict:dict):
  df1 = inDFs[0]  #get the first dataframe
  df2 = inDFs[1]	#get the second dataframe
  df = df1.join(df2, ['id'])
  
  #split the dataframe
  ratio = float(0.8)
  first_df = df.sample(True, ratio)
  second_df = df.sample(True, 1.0 - ratio)
  
  #output the dataframe
  outDFs = []
  outDFs.append(first_df)
  outDFs.append(second_df)
  
  return outDFs
fields.title: PySpark
fields.description: PySpark code to be run. Input dataframe : "inDF", SparkContext : "sc", SQLContext : "sqlContext",  Output/Result dataframe should be registered as a temporary table - df.registerTempTable("outDF")
